questions.question: During EDA, which of the following would be useful to identify outliers in the data?

explanations.a: Histograms show the frequency distribution but are not specifically used for identifying outliers.
explanations.b: Correct! Box plots are particularly useful for identifying outliers and visualizing data distribution.
explanations.c: Pie charts are used for showing proportions and are not useful for detecting outliers.
explanations.d: Line plots are used for time series data but are not ideal for detecting outliers.

questions.question: Which of the following techniques would you use in EDA to check for missing values in your dataset?

explanations.a: Box plots are useful for visualizing data distribution and outliers, not for missing values.
explanations.b: Correct! Null value analysis is performed to check for missing data in the dataset.
explanations.c: Bar plots are used for categorical data visualization, not for identifying missing values.
explanations.d: Heatmaps can also be useful for visualizing missing data by showing missing value patterns.

questions.question: What is a pair plot used for in EDA?

answers.b: Visualizing the distribution of individual features

explanations.a: Correct! Pair plots visualize the relationships between pairs of variables in a dataset.
explanations.b: Pair plots focus on relationships between variables, not individual feature distributions.
explanations.c: Missing data is not visualized by pair plots.
explanations.d: Pair plots are not specific to time series data.
